title: NHL 2002
description:
NHL 2002 is the latest hockey game from EA Sports. The game features improved lighting, customized celebrations, saucer passes, and better graphics. NHL 2002 includes all 30 NHL franchises, 20 international teams, and more than 700 face-mapped models of active NHL players. 

Pentium 300 MHz, 
32 MB RAM, 
Windows 95/98/ME/2K/XP, 
DirectX 8.0, 
4MB Direct-X compliant 3D accelerated video card, 
4x CD-ROM drive, 
100 MB hard-disk space
